item.title: Pomegranate Brownies
item.description: These are my first ever brownies but I had a lot of help from Michael Oliver. This recipe belongs to him. Pomegranate brownies Apparatus parchment paper large mixing bowl whisk spoon baking dish toothpick paring knife How to scrape a vanilla bean Vanilla is a beloved ingredient for its ability to enhance the flavor and aroma of any confection; it is an essential ingredient in everything from cakes and whipped cream to jams and ice cream.
